metadata.description: Sage Protocol plugin marketplace for Claude Code

plugins.name: sage-manager
plugins.description: Command-free Sage Protocol experience for Claude Code. Manage DAOs, governance, bounties, staking, and prompt libraries through intuitive visual interfaces.

plugins.name: solidity-audit
plugins.description: Use when auditing Solidity/EVM smart contracts, triaging Slither/Semgrep results, building threat models/invariants, or producing an audit report with reproducible evidence. CLI-first with Hound knowledge graphs.
